ygData.subject: Re: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I KNOW we have damaging songs, I use them all the time. My  suggestion was for a song which would be of equivalent damage to the lvl 14 spells of a druid.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I KNOW we have damaging songs, I use them all the time. My suggestion
was for a song which would be of equivalent damage to the lvl 14 spells of a
druid. My apologies for not clarifying.
I did think it a realistic option that verrant might consider. Here is one
other idea..and one dear to my heart! GET US WOMEN WEDDING DRESSES..with
mine coming up so near I know it will be too late for me :( but a wedding
dress instead of plate would be SO nice..sigh.....

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 40th chorus
Impatiently awaiting her wedding day......
